title: Lifespan
description: Sea turtles can live for more than 50 years in the wild.

title: Color
description: Green sea turtles are named for the greenish color of their fat, which is a result of their herbivorous diet of seagrass and algae

title: Shell
description: Unlike other turtles, sea turtles cannot retract their flippers and head into their shells.

title: Sleep Habits
description: Many sea turtles sleep underwater, holding their breath for up to 4-7 hours. Many also spend their entire life at sea, only returning to beaches when they need to lay their eggs
